title: Windsurf: An Agentic IDE That Thinks and Codes With You
author: Jack Wallen
description: Hands-on with Windsurf, an AI-powered IDE with built-in Codeium integration that claims to be the first truly "agentic" development environment.
cntitle: Windsurf：与你一同思考和编码的 Agentic IDE
cndescription: 亲身体验 Windsurf，一个由 AI 驱动的 IDE，内置 Codeium 集成，声称是第一个真正的“代理式”开发环境。
